title: This Buttermilk Brine Will Turn You Into a Turkey Breast Enthusiast
description:

title: Ear Candling Doesn't Work (and Can Make Your Earwax Worse)
description:
Plenty of folks swear that ear candling works, and if you’re trying to be good and not use Q-tips, this spa service may seem like a reasonable way to get earwax out of your ears. Unfortunately, the claims are too good to be true: Ear candling doesn’t work, and it can even be dangerous.
